HERO.TITLE: A curated collection of open-source backend APIs
HERO.SUBTITLE: OSAPIS is designed to help developers — especially frontend beginners — quickly integrate a ready-to-use backend for learning, experimentation, or building real projects. Each API comes with clear documentation and links to its dedicated repository.

APIS.NO_RESULTS_MESSAGE: Try adjusting your filters or search query to find what you're looking for.

LIST.NAME: User Authentication API
LIST.DESC: Handles user registration, login, logout, password hashing, JWT authentication, and role-based access.

LIST.NAME: User Authentication API
LIST.DESC: Secure authentication with JWT, bcrypt, sessions, and middleware protection for routes.

LIST.NAME: User Authentication API
LIST.DESC: Authentication system supporting session auth, JWT tokens, and Django permissions.

LIST.NAME: User Authentication API
LIST.DESC: Role-based secure authentication built with Spring Security and Kotlin.

LIST.NAME: E-Commerce API
LIST.DESC: Products, categories, carts, orders, and checkout endpoints with validation and pagination.

LIST.NAME: E-Commerce API
LIST.DESC: Complete e-commerce backend with Express, TypeORM, and Cart/Order flows.

LIST.NAME: E-Commerce API
LIST.DESC: Django-based store supporting product CRUD, carts, orders, and payment integration.

LIST.NAME: E-Commerce API
LIST.DESC: Spring Boot e-commerce system with JPA, carts, order management, and secure endpoints.

LIST.NAME: Blog API
LIST.DESC: Posts, categories, comments, tags, and Markdown support.

LIST.NAME: Blog API
LIST.DESC: REST blog backend with Express, Prisma, and route middleware.

LIST.NAME: Blog API
LIST.DESC: Blog system using Django ORM with comments, tags, filters, and admin support.

LIST.NAME: Blog API
LIST.DESC: Blog backend built with Spring Boot, supporting categories, comments, and slugging.

LIST.NAME: Task Manager API
LIST.DESC: Tasks, labels, priorities, due dates, and user assignments.

LIST.NAME: Task Manager API
LIST.DESC: Full CRUD task system with Express and Mongo/SQL support.

LIST.NAME: Task Manager API
LIST.DESC: Django-based task manager with authentication and filtering.

LIST.NAME: Task Manager API
LIST.DESC: Task management backend implemented in Spring Boot using RESTful conventions.
